salaryExpectations: Entirely project-based. Can range from small fees for indie projects to substantial sums for major commercials or films.
futureOutlook: The Sri Lankan film industry is small, and opportunities are limited and competitive. The commercial advertising sector provides more consistent work for directors and editors. This is a passion-driven industry where success depends heavily on talent, a strong portfolio (showreel), and building a good reputation and network over many years.
